ServiceDescription.HelpText: Posts the service description to the apigovau repository

ServiceDescriptionPreview.HelpText: Returns the service description as json

Uploaded.HelpText: Can get data from any uploaded files

PolledSet.HelpText: Can get data from any local file

Polled.HelpText: Can get data from any publicly available URL

MergeMarkdown.HelpText: Merges 2 markdown documents based on headings

SingleMarkdownToServiceDesign.HelpText: Converts a markdown document to a Service design
